thread.title: Restaurant serves black, red and yellow lego burgers
thread.title_full: Restaurant serves black, red and yellow lego burgers

author: Megan Charles
title: Restaurant serves black, red and yellow lego burgers
text:
Restaurant serves black, red and yellow lego burgers Watch | Restaurant serves black, red and yellow lego burgers 00:36 Megan Charles , video source AP 5 February 2017 â€¢ 9:25am 
I t's one of the latest - and weirdest - additions to the Philippines' culinary scene: the Brick Burger. A rectangular beef burger in a bun shaped like a piece of Lego, and there are three, very intense, colours to choose from. 
The restaurant first opened its doors in August 2016, after owner Jergs Correa realised his dream of a fast food joint that would cater to Lego lovers.
